# setNeedsTouchBarUpdate()

**Instance Method**

Tells the system to update the Touch Bar.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func setNeedsTouchBarUpdate()
```

## Discussion

Call this method when the value from [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIViewController/childViewControllerForTouchBar] changes.

## Managing the Touch Bar

- **childViewControllerForTouchBar**: The child view controller that the system uses to display content in the Touch Bar.
